title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Real-time insights for smart manufacturing with AWS Serverless (CNS375)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 AWS 无服务器实现智能制造的实时洞察 (CNS375)
abstract: Learn how to create applications that use real-time updates to improve user engagement. In this workshop, you will build a multiplayer game with real-time updates and a live leaderboard. Use AWS Amplify to connect an application frontend to a serverless backend. You must bring your laptop to participate.
abstract_cn: 学习如何创建使用实时更新来提高用户参与度的应用程序。在本研讨会中，您将构建一个具有实时更新和实时排行榜的多人游戏。使用 AWS Amplify 将应用程序前端连接到无服务器后端。您必须携带笔记本电脑才能参加。
